name: rattle bunny two-legged
notes:
materials:

- wool or cotton yarn. color a and color b
- 3 mm crochet hook
- stuffing
- scissors 
- tapestry needle

difficulty: easy

you should know how to work in the round, increase, decrease, and change colors.

final piece should measure approximately 3,15” (8cm) wide and 7” (18cm) high

this is a lanukas original free pattern, you can share it. please, don't claim as your own, don't copy or sell or this pattern. you can sell items made from this pattern. remember credit attribution.

also available in the following languages:

lithuanian: http://www.narplioju.lt/nerimas/ponas-baibukas/ thanks to ieva (ievuxe on ravelry)
